blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Incineganium Incineroar and Meganium fusion Fire/Grass Type Ability: Chlorophyll Stats: HP - 100, Atk - 105, Def - 110, SpA -...
caption:
Incineganium

Incineroar and Meganium fusion

Fire/Grass Type

Ability: Chlorophyll

Stats: HP - 100, Atk - 105, Def - 110, SpA - 90, SpD - 105, Spe - 70

The Long Necked Cat Pokemon

Incineganium is a gentle giant.  The foliage around its face continuously grows around it face so it needs to be burn off regularly.  The flame around its neck will burn brighter in sunlight.

Request for @datnuttykid. I hope you like it.

summary: During the Pikachu Outbreak, many stores and restaurants in Minatomirai offer some kind of promo to people attending the events...
caption:
During the Pikachu Outbreak, many stores and restaurants in Minatomirai offer some kind of promo to people attending the events - for instance, discounts for those wearing Pikachu-themed props or selling pokemon-themed items.

Pikachu-Eevee’s steak and eat-as-you-much buffet at Davis Beef Steak - I think this was the place that made most people laugh for imagining silly things…

blog.name: inikavulpixelreviews
blog.title: Let's Talk About Pokemon!
blog.description:
Reviewing my personal opinion on every single Pokemon! Yes, all 809 of them!
(Mostly) Daily Uploads, 3 PM EST.

title: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - Meloetta
body:
648: Meloetta

I feel like this review’s gonna be a repeat of Shaymin. Here we have a Mythic with a very cute, competent design with lots of fun aspects to it. Designed to be a singing Pokemon, it has hair that looks like a music sheet and little arms that look like music notes. And an adorable face. Plus a nice looking little earpiece with mic to complete the singing pop star sort of look. I really like Meloetta a lot, actually! Just… why is it a Legendary? You totally could’ve stuck this in the game as a regular Pokemon and I don’t think many people would’ve batted an eye about it. Besides, we already had a Mew-alike with Victini! But ehhhh. I guess we just have to have three post-release Mythics now, no matter what.

Personal Score: 9/10

I like you, Meloetta but. Why.

Pirouette Form:

And because every Legendary and their grandmother has to have an alternate form these days, Meloetta has Pirouette Form, becoming more a dancer than a singer. That said though, I feel like that concept is pulled off better here than most Legendary alt-forms. It changes form upon use of the move Relic Song, becoming this Normal/Fighting type. It’s an interesting interaction either way. But it still could’ve either been the alternate form of a normal Pokemon, or even been another Pokemon in a Throh-and-Sawk sort of situation.

Personal Score: 8/10

Still nice, at least.

Overall:

They’re very nice designs. Just… they don’t belong here. This Generation’s Legendaries are already encompassing heroic stag musketeers, form-shifting genies, and dragons with jet engines for asses. You could say the Musketeers at least fit in with the Dragons for them all being heroic Pokemon in on the Keeping-Pokemon vs Freeing-Pokemon argument the whole game’s story is themed around. But where’s the singing diva fit in with ANYTHING?

[Archive]

[[MORE]]

title: Slowpoke - 79
body:
It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.

- Pokemon Fire Red, X
